title: ApiManagementClient
description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on API entity and their Operations associated with your Azure API Management deployment.

Api_ListByService.title: Lists all APIs of the API Management service instance.
Api_ListByService.description: Lists all APIs of the API Management service instance.

Api_Delete.title: Deletes the specified API of the API Management service instance.
Api_Delete.description: Deletes the specified API of the API Management service instance.

Api_Get.title: Gets the details of the API specified by its identifier.
Api_Get.description: Gets the details of the API specified by its identifier.

Api_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API specified by its identifier.
Api_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API specified by its identifier.

Api_Update.title: Updates the specified API of the API Management service instance.
Api_Update.description: Updates the specified API of the API Management service instance.

Api_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates new or updates existing specified API of the API Management service instance.
Api_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates new or updates existing specified API of the API Management service instance.

ApiDiagnostic_ListByService.title: Lists all diagnostics of an API.
ApiDiagnostic_ListByService.description: Lists all diagnostics of an API.

ApiDiagnostic_Delete.title: Deletes the specified Diagnostic from an API.
ApiDiagnostic_Delete.description: Deletes the specified Diagnostic from an API.

ApiDiagnostic_Get.title: Gets the details of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiDiagnostic_Get.description: Gets the details of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiDiagnostic_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiDiagnostic_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiDiagnostic_Update.title: Updates the details of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiDiagnostic_Update.description: Updates the details of the Diagnostic for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiDiagnostic_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates a new Diagnostic for an API or updates an existing one.
ApiDiagnostic_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates a new Diagnostic for an API or updates an existing one.

ApiIssue_ListByService.title: Lists all issues associated with the specified API.
ApiIssue_ListByService.description: Lists all issues associated with the specified API.

ApiIssue_Delete.title: Deletes the specified Issue from an API.
ApiIssue_Delete.description: Deletes the specified Issue from an API.

ApiIssue_Get.title: Gets the details of the Issue for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiIssue_Get.description: Gets the details of the Issue for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiIssue_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Issue for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiIssue_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Issue for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiIssue_Update.title: Updates an existing issue for an API.
ApiIssue_Update.description: Updates an existing issue for an API.

ApiIssue_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates a new Issue for an API or updates an existing one.
ApiIssue_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates a new Issue for an API or updates an existing one.

ApiIssueAttachment_ListByService.title: Lists all attachments for the Issue associated with the specified API.
ApiIssueAttachment_ListByService.description: Lists all attachments for the Issue associated with the specified API.

ApiIssueAttachment_Delete.title: Deletes the specified comment from an Issue.
ApiIssueAttachment_Delete.description: Deletes the specified comment from an Issue.

ApiIssueAttachment_Get.title: Gets the details of the issue Attachment for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiIssueAttachment_Get.description: Gets the details of the issue Attachment for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiIssueAttachment_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the issue Attachment for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiIssueAttachment_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the issue Attachment for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiIssueAttachment_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates a new Attachment for the Issue in an API or updates an existing one.
ApiIssueAttachment_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates a new Attachment for the Issue in an API or updates an existing one.

ApiIssueComment_ListByService.title: Lists all comments for the Issue associated with the specified API.
ApiIssueComment_ListByService.description: Lists all comments for the Issue associated with the specified API.

ApiIssueComment_Delete.title: Deletes the specified comment from an Issue.
ApiIssueComment_Delete.description: Deletes the specified comment from an Issue.

ApiIssueComment_Get.title: Gets the details of the issue Comment for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiIssueComment_Get.description: Gets the details of the issue Comment for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiIssueComment_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the issue Comment for an API specified by its identifier.
ApiIssueComment_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the issue Comment for an API specified by its identifier.

ApiIssueComment_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates a new Comment for the Issue in an API or updates an existing one.
ApiIssueComment_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates a new Comment for the Issue in an API or updates an existing one.

ApiOperation_ListByApi.title: Lists a collection of the operations for the specified API.
ApiOperation_ListByApi.description: Lists a collection of the operations for the specified API.

ApiOperation_Delete.title: Deletes the specified operation in the API.
ApiOperation_Delete.description: Deletes the specified operation in the API.

ApiOperation_Get.title: Gets the details of the API Operation specified by its identifier.
ApiOperation_Get.description: Gets the details of the API Operation specified by its identifier.

ApiOperation_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API operation specified by its identifier.
ApiOperation_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API operation specified by its identifier.

ApiOperation_Update.title: Updates the details of the operation in the API specified by its identifier.
ApiOperation_Update.description: Updates the details of the operation in the API specified by its identifier.

ApiOperation_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates a new operation in the API or updates an existing one.
ApiOperation_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates a new operation in the API or updates an existing one.

ApiOperationPolicy_ListByOperation.title: Get the list of policy configuration at the API Operation level.
ApiOperationPolicy_ListByOperation.description: Get the list of policy configuration at the API Operation level.

ApiOperationPolicy_Delete.title: Deletes the policy configuration at the Api Operation.
ApiOperationPolicy_Delete.description: Deletes the policy configuration at the Api Operation.

ApiOperationPolicy_Get.title: Get the policy configuration at the API Operation level.
ApiOperationPolicy_Get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API Operation level.

ApiOperationPolicy_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API operation policy specified by its identifier.
ApiOperationPolicy_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API operation policy specified by its identifier.

ApiOperationPolicy_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates or updates policy configuration for the API Operation level.
ApiOperationPolicy_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates or updates policy configuration for the API Operation level.

Tag_ListByOperation.title: Lists all Tags associated with the Operation.
Tag_ListByOperation.description: Lists all Tags associated with the Operation.

Tag_DetachFromOperation.title: Detach the tag from the Operation.
Tag_DetachFromOperation.description: Detach the tag from the Operation.

Tag_GetByOperation.title: Get tag associated with the Operation.
Tag_GetByOperation.description: Get tag associated with the Operation.

Tag_GetEntityStateByOperation.title: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.
Tag_GetEntityStateByOperation.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

Operation_ListByTags.title: Lists a collection of operations associated with tags.
Operation_ListByTags.description: Lists a collection of operations associated with tags.

ApiPolicy_ListByApi.title: Get the policy configuration at the API level.
ApiPolicy_ListByApi.description: Get the policy configuration at the API level.

ApiPolicy_Delete.title: Deletes the policy configuration at the Api.
ApiPolicy_Delete.description: Deletes the policy configuration at the Api.

ApiPolicy_Get.title: Get the policy configuration at the API level.
ApiPolicy_Get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API level.

ApiPolicy_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API policy specified by its identifier.
ApiPolicy_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the API policy specified by its identifier.

ApiPolicy_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates or updates policy configuration for the API.
ApiPolicy_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates or updates policy configuration for the API.

ApiProduct_ListByApis.title: Lists all Products, which the API is part of.
ApiProduct_ListByApis.description: Lists all Products, which the API is part of.

ApiRelease_List.title: Lists all releases of an API. An API release is created when making an API Revision current. Releases are also used to rollback to previous revisions. Results will be paged and can be constrained by the $top and $skip parameters.
ApiRelease_List.description: Lists all releases of an API. An API release is created when making an API Revision current. Releases are also used to rollback to previous revisions. Results will be paged and can be constrained by the $top and $skip parameters.

ApiRelease_Delete.title: Deletes the specified release in the API.
ApiRelease_Delete.description: Deletes the specified release in the API.

ApiRelease_Get.title: Returns the details of an API release.
ApiRelease_Get.description: Returns the details of an API release.

ApiRelease_GetEntityTag.title: Returns the etag of an API release.
ApiRelease_GetEntityTag.description: Returns the etag of an API release.

ApiRelease_Update.title: Updates the details of the release of the API specified by its identifier.
ApiRelease_Update.description: Updates the details of the release of the API specified by its identifier.

ApiRelease_Create.title: Creates a new Release for the API.
ApiRelease_Create.description: Creates a new Release for the API.

ApiRevisions_List.title: Lists all revisions of an API.
ApiRevisions_List.description: Lists all revisions of an API.

ApiSchema_ListByApi.title: Get the schema configuration at the API level.
ApiSchema_ListByApi.description: Get the schema configuration at the API level.

ApiSchema_Delete.title: Deletes the schema configuration at the Api.
ApiSchema_Delete.description: Deletes the schema configuration at the Api.

ApiSchema_Get.title: Get the schema configuration at the API level.
ApiSchema_Get.description: Get the schema configuration at the API level.

ApiSchema_GetEntityTag.title: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the schema specified by its identifier.
ApiSchema_GetEntityTag.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the schema specified by its identifier.

ApiSchema_CreateOrUpdate.title: Creates or updates schema configuration for the API.
ApiSchema_CreateOrUpdate.description: Creates or updates schema configuration for the API.

TagDescription_ListByApi.title: Lists all Tags descriptions in scope of API. Model similar to swagger - tagDescription is defined on API level but tag may be assigned to the Operations
TagDescription_ListByApi.description: Lists all Tags descriptions in scope of API. Model similar to swagger - tagDescription is defined on API level but tag may be assigned to the Operations

TagDescription_Delete.title: Delete tag description for the Api.
TagDescription_Delete.description: Delete tag description for the Api.

TagDescription_Get.title: Get Tag description in scope of API
TagDescription_Get.description: Get Tag description in scope of API

TagDescription_GetEntityState.title: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.
TagDescription_GetEntityState.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

TagDescription_CreateOrUpdate.title: Create/Update tag description in scope of the Api.
TagDescription_CreateOrUpdate.description: Create/Update tag description in scope of the Api.

Tag_ListByApi.title: Lists all Tags associated with the API.
Tag_ListByApi.description: Lists all Tags associated with the API.

Tag_DetachFromApi.title: Detach the tag from the Api.
Tag_DetachFromApi.description: Detach the tag from the Api.

Tag_GetByApi.title: Get tag associated with the API.
Tag_GetByApi.description: Get tag associated with the API.

Tag_GetEntityStateByApi.title: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.
